# Driatheli Group SRL - Infinitrade Romania

> Authorized distributor of industrial equipment in Romania since 2009.
> Pumps, valves, electric motors, heat exchangers, blowers.
> Brands: Grundfos, Wilo, Siemens, ABB, Alfa Laval, KSB, ARI Armaturen, Spirax Sarco.

## Company

## Product Categories (15 categories, 238+ brands)
### Core Categories (5)
- [Industrial Pumps](https://infinitrade.ro/pompe-industriale) - Grundfos, Wilo, KSB, Lowara, Ebara, Sulzer, Netzsch, Brinkmann, Becker, DAB (41+ brands)
- [Industrial Valves](https://infinitrade.ro/robineti-industriali) - ARI Armaturen, Spirax Sarco, Ebro Armaturen, End Armaturen, Danfoss, Gestra Flowserve, Leser, Samson, Mankenberg (29+ brands)
- [Electric Motors](https://infinitrade.ro/motoare-electrice) - Siemens, SEW Eurodrive, ABB, Bonfiglioli, Marelli, Brook Crompton, WEG, Nord, Leroy Somer (26+ brands)
- [Heat Exchangers](https://infinitrade.ro/schimbatoare-caldura) - Alfa Laval, Kelvion, SWEP, Danfoss, Funke, Emmegi (18+ brands)
- [Blowers & Fans](https://infinitrade.ro/suflante-ventilatoare) - Becker, FPZ, Ziehl Abegg, Gardner Denver, Elmo Rietschle, Elektror, Aerzen (17+ brands)

### Additional Equipment Categories (10)
- [Industrial Automation](https://infinitrade.ro/automatizari-industriale) - Siemens, ABB, Schneider Electric, Mitsubishi, Rockwell Automation. PLC, HMI, SCADA, actuators, industrial relays (15+ brands, 5000+ products)
- [Sensors & Instrumentation](https://infinitrade.ro/senzori-instrumentatie) - Endress+Hauser, WIKA, Siemens, Emerson. Pressure, temperature, flow, level measurement (20+ brands, 8000+ products)
- [Hydraulic & Pneumatic Components](https://infinitrade.ro/componente-hidraulice-pneumatice) - Parker, Bosch Rexroth, Festo, SMC. Cylinders, valves, pumps, hoses (15+ brands, 12000+ products)
- [Electrical Equipment & Automation](https://infinitrade.ro/echipamente-electrice) - Siemens, ABB, Schneider Electric, Eaton. Circuit breakers, contactors, VFDs, cables (20+ brands, 15000+ products)
- [Mechanical Components & Transmissions](https://infinitrade.ro/componente-mecanice) - SKF, FAG, NSK, Timken, Gates. Bearings, belts, chains, seals, couplings (15+ brands, 20000+ products)
- [Filters & Industrial Consumables](https://infinitrade.ro/filtre-consumabile) - Mann+Hummel, Donaldson, Parker, Hydac. Hydraulic, air, oil filters (12+ brands, 8000+ products)
- [Tools & Measuring Instruments](https://infinitrade.ro/scule-instrumente) - Bosch Professional, Hilti, Makita, Mitutoyo. Power tools, pneumatic tools, precision measuring (10+ brands, 5000+ products)
- [Thermal & HVAC Equipment](https://infinitrade.ro/echipamente-termice) - Carrier, Daikin, Trane, Grundfos HVAC. Chillers, boilers, fan heaters, AC systems (8+ brands, 2000+ products)
- [Lubricants & Industrial Chemicals](https://infinitrade.ro/lubrifianti-chimice) - Shell, Mobil, Castrol, Klüber. Hydraulic oils, greases, adhesives, coolants (8+ brands, 1500+ products)
- [Auxiliary Equipment & Safety](https://infinitrade.ro/echipamente-auxiliare) - 3M Safety, Dräger, MSA, Kärcher Industrial. PPE, industrial cleaning, dosing systems, tanks (8+ brands, 3000+ products)

## Industry Solutions
We serve 15+ industries including:
- [Petrochemicals & Refineries](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/petrochimie) - ATEX certified equipment
- [Energy & Utilities](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/energie) - Power plants and district heating
- [Food Industry](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/alimentar) - Stainless steel equipment, food-safe
- [Pharmaceutical](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/farmaceutic) - Clean room compatible
- [Water Treatment](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/tratare-apa) - Wastewater and drinking water solutions
- [Chemical Industry](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/chimie) - Chemical-resistant materials

## Company Facts
- Founded: 2009 (17 years in business)
- Legal name: Driatheli Group SRL
- Tax ID (CUI): RO26209397
- Registration: J35/2901/2009
- Employees: 16
- Location: Ghiroda, Timiș, Romania
- Brands: 238+ international brands (expanded portfolio)
- Product Categories: 15 (5 core + 10 additional equipment)
- Total Products: 80000+ SKUs
- Pages: ~359 (categories, brands, industries, guides, blog)
- Clients: 800+ active industrial customers
- SEAP/SICAP: Registered supplier for public procurement
- Certifications: ISO 9001:2015, Authorized Distributors
- Delivery: 24-72h for stock items, throughout Romania
